title: Spirit Airlines Brawl, Serena Williams, Racist Police Force, Back 2 School Memories and more.
itunes:title: Spirit Airlines Brawl, Serena Williams, Racist Police Force, Back 2 School Memories and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Tommy shares with us some family memories.  All of your love concerns will be handled with none other than Mr. Ready to Love who is in for The CLO.  Nipsey is immortalized in Hollywood.  The viral video was shot in DFW airport and a belligerent woman was seen arguing with and swinging on a Spirit Airlines employee.  To share your location or not is the question.  Is it appropriate between couples or nah?  Serena Williams the GOAT is about to retire.  The crew reminisce about their back 2 school memories.  An entire precinct in Alabama has been fired for racist behavior.  Would You Rather had 7 figures, body parts and hamsters.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve brings up the test.  You can't have a testimony until you pass a test.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
